title: Guilty Pleasures A to Z
description: Guilty Pleasures A to Z is a short story collection of naughty behaviors and sizzling delights. The stories go from "Analyze" to "Zaftig On A Platter" and touch on themes such as masturbation, threesomes, paranormal, voyeurs, swapping, plus a whole lot more. Let your imagination soar as this book takes you on ride to places deep and dark inside.
author: R.E. Norwood
